eventKeyPropertyName.description: The name of the property that will be auto-generated to store the event key. Defaults to 'Event Key' if not specified.

mergedSchemaFile.description: Path to a single merged schema file containing events, groups, and dimensions. When specified, this takes precedence over separate events/groups/dimensions files.

mergedSchemaOutput.description: Path where a merged schema file should be written when using separate schema files.
